sentences.sContent: And because of the oxytocin and vasopressin, they want to have sex with the same vole.
sentences.sContent_eng: And because of the oxytocin and vasopressin, they want to have sex with the same vole.
sentences.sCn: 又因为催产素和垂体后叶加压素的作用，它们只想与同一田鼠做爱。

sentences.sContent: A fledgling white-tailed kite [bottom] grabs a vole from its father 100 feet above the ground in mid-flight.
sentences.sContent_eng: A fledgling white-tailed kite [bottom] grabs a vole from its father 100 feet above the ground in mid-flight.
sentences.sCn: 一只年幼的白尾鸢（下面那只）在离地面100英尺的高度的飞行中从父亲爪上攫取野鼠。

trans.tranOther: a small animal like a mouse with a short tail that lives in fields and woods and near rivers
